oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bill Monroe's Bluegrass Holiday at the Civic Center (19386)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996; Osborne Brothers;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (red and black on white) announcing the Bluegrass Holiday concert with Bill Monroe, the Osborne Brothers, the Bluegrass Boys, Ralph Lewis Family and friends, Wiley and Zeke, the Morris Brothers, Marc Pruitt and Asheville Bluegrass at the Civic Center Thomas World Auditorium on December 9. Poster features metal photoplates of Bill Monroe and the Osborne Brothers. To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/21050.
